meanings.sent1: She looked very blazered in her smart jacket.
meanings.sent2: He always appears blazered at formal events.
meanings.sent3: The penguin felt quite blazered in its tuxedo.
meanings.sent4: The night sky was blazered with twinkling stars.
meanings.sent5: The garden was blazered with colorful flowers.

meanings.definition: Covered or adorned with a blazer.
meanings.sent1: The blazered man stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The blazered table added elegance to the room.
meanings.sent3: The cake was blazered with candles for the celebration.
meanings.sent4: The field was blazered with flags for the game.
meanings.sent5: The tree was blazered with fairy lights for the party.
